text: praqjA(gm) sO#mArauqdraM caqruM nirva#pEdaBiqcaran$-thsauqmyO vai dEqvata#yAq puru#Sha EqSha ruqdrO yadaqgniH svAyA# Eqvaina#M dEqvatA#yai niqShkrIya# ruqdrAyApi# dadhAti tAqjagArtiqmArcCa#ti sOmArauqdraM caqruM nirva#pEq-jjyOgA#mayAvIq sOmaqM ~MvA Eqtasyaq rasO# gacCatyaqgni(gm) SarI#raqM ~Myasyaq jyOgAqmaya#tiq sOmA#dEqvAsyaq rasa#M niShkrIqNAtyaqgnEH SarI#ramuqta yadIq - [  ]  56
